column1: Little Goat Diner////Service: holy balls it has the most impeccable service I've seen anywhere other than at a fine dining restaurant.  Friends and I were running low on crackers for our crab dip.  Server notices it literally from across the room
column2: grabs the crackers from the kitchen
column3: and brings them our way.  It's AWESOME knowing that the servers are always keeping an eye on you
column4: even when they're away from your table!
